Lack enough support: The claim lacks support as there is no evidence or reliable source provided to verify the information about the range of Pakistani Shaheen III missiles being 5770km.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the Pakistani military is hiding the actual range of the Shaheen III missile based on a fabricated tweet. This assumption is problematic as there is no credible evidence to support it.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the Pakistani military officially announced the range of the Shaheen-III missile as 2750 kilometers, not 5770 kilometers.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the range of the Shaheen III missile by stating it as 5770km without any factual basis.
Understate: There is no evidence of any understatement bias in the provided claim.
Falters at times: The claim falters by relying on a fabricated tweet and not providing any credible sources or evidence to support the information.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not provide any alternative explanations or consider other possibilities.
